personal_income_tax.exemptions: First 18,000 MAD of income is tax-free.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 12% of salary (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.rate: 30% of net profits after tax deductions.
corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 20% of net profits for small businesses with less than 500,000 MAD revenue.
corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Only if earned through a Moroccan branch or subsidiary.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 10% for domestic dividends, 20% for foreign dividends.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 14% on basic food items, transport, and tourism.

property_tax.exemptions: Main residence owned by low-income families.

wealth_tax.rate: 1.5% on net worth above 100 million MAD.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Remote working contract, proof of income, and health insurance.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: 50% of professional income tax is waived.

special_economic_zones.name: Casablanca Finance City
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Reduced corporate tax rate of 20%, tax exemptions for employees.

special_economic_zones.name: Tangier Automotive City
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Reduced corporate tax rate of 20%, customs exemptions.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on income and dividends.

additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 53rd in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
